channel.title: Cache Question
channel.description: Lately I've seen many people having trouble with adding auto cache downloader to their client, but why add auto cache downloader ? I tryed adding it and it didnt work so i want some1 to tell me how to make cache run while it's in the client files... like when my player downloads my client its not only the client but its the client with cache files in it. and when my players run the server's client it will run on the cache INSIDE THE CLIENT FILES. if some1 can tell me here how it will be appreciated and if they cant at least give me a link :( i tryed using search bar and it didnt work. Thanks in advance.

item.title: Cache Question
item.dc:creator: @II_john_II II john II
item.description:
@II_john_II wrote:

Alright but i need it ASAP If any1 can tell me it here very briefly and i will try it and if it works with me i will post a TUT about it and i will give him credits

Read full topic
